headline.print_headline: Serena Beats Sharapova to Reach Ninth Miami Final
headline.main: Serena Beats Sharapova to Reach Ninth Miami Final

docs.snippet: World number one Serena Williams continued her decade-long domination over Maria Sharapova with a clinical 6-4 6-3 win on Thursday to reach her ninth Sony Open final....
docs.lead_paragraph: World number one Serena Williams continued her decade-long domination over Maria Sharapova with a clinical 6-4 6-3 win on Thursday to reach her ninth Sony Open final.

headline.print_headline: Ex-Dewey Finance Director Admits Accounting Was False
headline.main: Ex-Dewey Finance Director Admits Accounting Was False

docs.snippet: Dewey & LeBoeuf's ex-finance director pleaded guilty to grand larceny last month and admitted he knew false financial statements were being provided to the firm's lenders, according to court documents unsealed on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Dewey & LeBoeuf's ex-finance director pleaded guilty to grand larceny last month and admitted he knew false financial statements were being provided to the firm's lenders, according to court documents unsealed on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Maryland Local Official Defies Court, Opens Meeting With Prayer
headline.main: Maryland Local Official Defies Court, Opens Meeting With Prayer

docs.snippet: A county official in Maryland opened an official meeting on Thursday with a prayer referencing Jesus Christ, according to a person who attended the meeting and local media, two days after a federal judge issued an injunction prohibiting such a pra...
docs.lead_paragraph: A county official in Maryland opened an official meeting on Thursday with a prayer referencing Jesus Christ, according to a person who attended the meeting and local media, two days after a federal judge issued an injunction prohibiting such a prayer.

headline.print_headline: Sprint in Talks With Dish on Broadband Partnership
headline.main: Sprint in Talks With Dish on Broadband Partnership

docs.snippet: Sprint Corp is in talks with Dish Network Corp on a fixed wireless broadband partnership, the chairman of Sprint Corp told Reuters on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Sprint Corp is in talks with Dish Network Corp on a fixed wireless broadband partnership, the chairman of Sprint Corp told Reuters on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Anti-Anxiety Drugs Tied to Higher Mortality
headline.main: Anti-Anxiety Drugs Tied to Higher Mortality

docs.snippet: Sleeping pills were also linked to an increased risk of death in a large study....
docs.abstract: Sleeping pills were also linked to an increased risk of death in a large study.

headline.print_headline: Ex-Finance Director of Failed Law Firm Says Its Chairman Feared Audit
headline.main: Ex-Finance Director of Dewey & LeBoeuf Says Its Chairman Feared Audit

docs.snippet: Francis J. Canellas, the former finance chief of the bankrupt law firm, spoke to New York prosecutors after pleading guilty this year to taking part in a scheme to manipulate the firm’s financial statements....
docs.abstract: Francis J. Canellas, the former finance chief of the bankrupt law firm, spoke to New York prosecutors after pleading guilty this year to taking part in a scheme to manipulate the firm’s financial statements.

headline.print_headline: FDA Advisers Back Exact Sciences Colon Cancer Test
headline.main: FDA Advisers Back Exact Sciences Colon Cancer Test

docs.snippet: A panel of Food and Drug Administration advisers has voted to endorse an experimental stool test that uses DNA to detect colon cancer and precancerous growths....
docs.lead_paragraph: A panel of Food and Drug Administration advisers has voted to endorse an experimental stool test that uses DNA to detect colon cancer and precancerous growths.

headline.print_headline: Gold Slides After Reports of Improving US Economy
headline.main: Gold Slides After Reports of Improving US Economy

docs.snippet: Gold dropped to its lowest price in more than a month as reports of an improving U.S. economy weakened the metal's appeal....
docs.lead_paragraph: Gold dropped to its lowest price in more than a month as reports of an improving U.S. economy weakened the metal's appeal.

headline.print_headline: U.N. Raises Alarm Over Escalating Violence in Darfur
headline.main: U.N. Raises Alarm Over Escalating Violence in Darfur

docs.snippet: United Nations and African Union officials sounded an alarm on Thursday over the worsening violence in Sudan's western Darfur region, which has led to the displacement of hundreds of thousands of people this year in the remote, conflict-torn terri...
docs.lead_paragraph: United Nations and African Union officials sounded an alarm on Thursday over the worsening violence in Sudan's western Darfur region, which has led to the displacement of hundreds of thousands of people this year in the remote, conflict-torn territory.
